text_block_list.text:
A day off――I was planning on heading out 
somewhere when I spotted Sakura Laurel.

『Good morning, Victory~♪ 
Salutations, Full of energy, Today's also A-okay~♪』
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san! Hello! Today, I was thinking of going 
to a place I've been interested in for a while.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
……Ah, that's right! If it's okay with you, 
Trainer-san, how about coming with me?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
I wanted to understand more about Sakura 
Laurel so I decided to tag along.

It's a beautiful church, isn't it? The architecture here 
incorporates many elements associated with France, you know?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
I found it while searching the net! 
I knew I definitely had to come see it in person.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Sakura Laurel had a strong admiration and dream that was 
related to France. Was this church also a part of that?
! ……Fufufuu♪ I'm glad you asked!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
First, this stained glass! 
It's a characteristic of the Gothic architectural style!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Tall ceilings with large windows to let in a lot of light―― 
That's what this style was developed for.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Outside, there are gargoyles! They're an unusual design 
that actually functions as a rain gutter♪ And also――
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Actually, this place looks a little similar to 
the church where my parents got married.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
In my room, I've got a bunch of photos of those 
memories on my walls……and among those, is a photo of 
my parents walking down the aisle for their wedding.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text: Whenever I look at it, I can't help but feel all warm inside――
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
choice_data_list: <size=39>That's why you wanted to see it in person</size>
<size=39>That's why you wanted to see it in person</size>

text_block_list.text:
Yes! This altar too…… 
yeah, it really looks similar.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
……――That's right! Hey, Trainer-san. 
Want to try walking it together?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Before I could say anything, Sakura Laurel linked 
arms with me and pulled me along. Almost like she 
was re-enacting the last part of a wedding.

Did you know? At the end, when the Bride and 
Groom walk together, it's to symbolize that 
they'll be walking their 『Future』 together.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text: Even if now, they're living apart――
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Je ne pense qu'a toi chaque jour! 
My beloved, today too, I can't think of anything but you.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
It's something that my father tells my mother whenever 
they meet♪ It's wonderful, isn't it? It's almost 
like he's saying "My heart is always with you"
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
No matter how far apart, they're always thinking of each other, 
and trust each other……The parents that I'm proud of!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Seeing her smile like that made me happy as well. 
That said, what she said and did earlier……
choice_data_list: <size=39>You can't do this with just anyone though</size>

text_block_list.text:
Ah……Fufu, I'm sorry. 
I'll be careful!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
This is my favorite cafe! I wanted Trainer-san 
to try the French food here too.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
choice_data_list: Thanks, I'm looking forward to it!
Thanks, I'm looking forward to it!

text_block_list.text:
Though I said that……the menu is very French indeed. 
Honestly, it all looks like gibberish to me……!

I wonder what I should get today~. 
Maybe bourguignon?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, what about――……Ooooh, do you prefer delicacies? 
That section is almost all French food. You've got quite the eye~!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
I was initially intimidated when she pointed that out 
but, that means it should be the best parts of French 
cuisine. I'll take it as a challenge and try it out!

Sorry for the wait~. 
This is the andouillette and the Roquefort salad.
text_block_list.name: Cafe Staff

text_block_list.text:
These delicacies were more impressive than I expected……! 
A unique-looking sausage and blue cheese……I couldn't help 
but feel lost when faced with unfamiliar ingredients.
Wah~ it looks delicious! Thanks for the meal!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
The moment I put the food in my mouth, a very pungent scent 
assaulted my nose! This is……incredibly……distinctive……!!
……Trainer-san? Are you okay?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Waah, that's not good! 
I see, maybe it was too much for a first-timer!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
But, it'll be fine! Actually――For this unique andouillette, 
there's a special magic to make it tastier!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
choice_data_list: Eh, what is it……some kind of sauce?

text_block_list.text:
Correct! That's right! By eating it with this mustard sauce, 
it'll reduce the smell and make it easier to scarf it down♪
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
I tried what she said――the mustard did a good job masking 
the pungent scent……the taste was strong but it was tasty!

Next I'll explain the salad~! 
First, try eating one of those purple leaves.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Ahahahaa, isn't it~!? Now, with that bitter taste in your mouth, 
what happens when you add a little bit of that dressing~?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Right, right! The dressing here――is called a vinaigrette, 
but, it goes best with Trevis leaves!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
And the blue cheese on top is called Roquefort. It has a strong 
salty taste that goes well with the salad, so try a bite♪
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Eating everything in the manner that Sakura Laurel 
suggested made the meal delicious. I think I understand 
why she prefers French cuisine now.
choice_data_list: French food is almost like magic
French food is almost like magic

text_block_list.text:
……That's right. No matter what ingredients you have, even if 
it's difficult to eat, it's made in a way to make it delicious――
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
choice_data_list: Is what you're eating the same?
Is what you're eating the same?

text_block_list.text:
Ah, yeah! This is called 『Boeuf à la Bourguignonne』. 
It's beef made from the tough meat in the cheek, 
stewed in red win to make it tender.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
It looks delicious. Next time we come here, maybe I should 
try ordering that. So I don't forget, I make a memo.
――……Fufu. You're alike……
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text: ――Nope, I didn't♪
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
How about ordering some dessert? 
I've got some more recommendations♪
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Thank you for today! 
Were you able to enjoy that quick tour of France?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Fufufu, I'm glad! Let's do this together 
again sometime, I'll be your guide then too♪
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Today, I learned alot about Sakura Laurel……more and more, 
I wanted to lend my strength to her.
